messages.content: What words in the Finnish language end in the letter "L"?

The Finnish language has many words that end in the letter "L". Here are some of them:
1. Lääkäri (Doctor)
2. Lämpö (Heat)
3. Leipä (Bread)
4. Lähtö (Departure)
5. Liikenne (Transportation)
6. Liikkeellä (Moving)
7. Liikenne (Travel)
8. Lihavuus (Weight)
9. Liikunta (Exercise)
10. Liikunnan (Exercise)
Which of those word have the letter L at the end of the word?
The words that end in the letter "L" in the Finnish language are "liikenne", "liikunnan", "liikunta", and "liikunta".
I don't see an "L" at the end of any of those words. What is the last letter of those words?
I apologize for the confusion. The words that end in the letter "L" in the Finnish language are "liikenne", "liikunnan", "liikunta", and "liikunta".
Please take the last letter of each of those words. List just the last letters of the words.
The last letter of each of the words is "L".
What is the last letter of a word that ends in the letter a?
The last letter of a word that ends in the letter "a" is always a vowel sound. In the Finnish language, the vowel sound "a" is represented by the letter "a".
Which of the words you listed end in the letter "a"?
All of the words I listed end in the letter "a".
Do those words end in the letter "l"?
No, the words I listed do not end in the letter "l". They end in the letter "a".
Can you give me two Finnish words that end in the letter "l"? The words must not have any other letter at their end.

Sure, here are two Finnish words that end in the letter "l":
1. Liikence (Traffic)
2. Liikennemerkki (Road Marker)
What is the last letter of those words?
The last letter of the Finnish words "liikence" and "liikennemerkki" is "i".
